content.description:
The content of the worksheet.
 By default, it will be cut off in SearchWorksheet() method. If it doesn't match the `content_size`, you can
 use GetWorksheet() request to retrieve the full content.

contentSize.description: content_size is the full size of the content, may not match the size of the `content` field.

createTime.description: The create time of the worksheet.

creator.description:
The creator of the Worksheet.
 Format: users/{email}

project.description:
The project resource name.
 Format: projects/{project}

starred.description: starred indicates whether the worksheet is starred by the current authenticated user.

updateTime.description: The last update time of the worksheet.
